Risk_Description: Personal data processed without lawful basis or transparency
Control / Mitigation: Define purpose+legal basis; provide notices; limit access

Risk_Description: Special category data handled without extra safeguards
Control / Mitigation: Classify data; apply stricter access controls; audit handling

Risk_Description: Missing IP+port+timestamp logs breaks attribution and incident response
Control / Mitigation: Standardize logging; time sync; retention policy

Risk_Description: Takedown / access-blocking decisions not handled on time
Unauthorized access or misuse of systems leads to criminal exposure
Control / Mitigation: Least privilege; MFA; monitoring; security training

Risk_Description: Evidence integrity breaks due to no hashing/chain-of-custody
Weak proof of consent (click-wrap) causes disputes
Control / Mitigation: Store consent logs; clear UI; versioning
Pre-contract info checklist; clear refund flow

Risk_Description: Misleading ads or spam marketing creates legal/brand risk
Control / Mitigation: Approval workflow; consent-based marketing; ad claims verification

Risk_Description: Using unlicensed content or infringing trademarks/patents
Control / Mitigation: License tracking; brand usage rules; takedown process
